name: Super Speed Slapper!
description:
Super Speed Slapper

Run through a forest or the south pole while slapping zombies and picking up boosters. Jump on plants in the jungle and slide around in the arctic terrain, all while dodging boulders and destroying evil beasts.

Themes for JamGoJam DNA 10:          

  • Hack 'n' Slash - Permanently killing zombies as you play.
  • Nature - Snow and Jungle terrains.
  • Inertia - The camera is permanently moving and the ice is slightly slippery.
  • Fanfare Music - When the 'switch mode' pick up is collected a fanfare tune will play.

Play with controller or keyboard on any computer, including mac! 

A controller is necessary to play this game on mobile, no in game controls are available.
